titleStmt.title: SII 8.67: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 67. (A.R. No. 478 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭan=taiyum poṟceyap pāvaiyuñ cīrttanic celviyu n=taṉ perun=te viyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭutiyal lūḻiyil liṭaituṟaiñāṭu n=tuṭar vaṉavelip paṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷiccūḻ matiḷ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkarumaraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porukaṭal liḻattaraicar tammuṭiyu māṅkavar teviyar roṅkeḻil muṭiyu muṉnavarpakkal teṉnavar vaitta cun=taramuṭiyu min=tiranāramum teṉṟicai Iḻḻa maṇṭalamuḻuvatum Eṟipaṭaik keraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyil cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatirvelait tolperuṅkāvaṟ palpaḻantivum ceruviṟ cinavil Irupattorukā laraicukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ melvaruñ cān=timaṟṟi varaṇ karuti yiruttiya cempoṟ ṟiruntakumuṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika mucaṅkiyil mutukiṭ ṭoḷitta cayaciṅka ṉaḷapperum pukaḻḻoṭum piṭiyal yiraṭṭapāṭi Eḻaraiyilakkamum navanetik kulaperumalaikaḷum vikkiramavīrac cakkarakoṭṭamum mutiravaṭavallai maturamaṇṭalamum kāmiṭaivaḷar nāmaṇaikkoṇaiyum veñcilaivīrar pañcappaḷḷiyum pācaṭaipaḻaṉa mācuṇitecamum Ayarvil vaṇkīrtti Āti
nakaravaiyil can=tiran ṟolkulat tin=tirarataṉai viḷaiyamarkaḷattuk kiḷaiyoṭum piṭittu palataṉattoṭu niṟaikulataṉak kuvaiyum kiṭṭaruñ ceṟimiḷai Oṭṭaviṣaiyamum pūcirarcer nalkocalaiñāṭu n=taṉmapālaṉai vemmuṉai yaḻittu vaṇṭuṟaicolait taṇṭapputtiyu miraṇacūraṉai muraṇukat tākki tikkaṉai kirttit takkaṇalāṭamum kovin=tacan=taṉ māviḻin=toṭat taṅkāta cāral vaṅkāḷatecamum toṭukaḻal caṅkoṭṭal mahivāḷaṉai veñcamar viḷākat tañcuvittaruḷi Oṇṭiṟal liyāṉaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramum nittila neṭuṅkaṭal luttiralāṭamum veṟimalar tīrtta teṟipunal kaṅkaiyum Alaikaṭal naṭuvuḷ palakalañ celutti caṅkirāmavicaiyottuṅkapaṉmanākiya kaṭārattaraicaṉai vākaiyamporukaṭaṟ kumpakkariyoṭu makappaṭut turimaiyil piṟakkiya perunetip piṟakkamum Ārttavaṉnakarṉakar poṟṟoḻilvācallil viccātirattoraṇamum moyttoḻil puṉaimaṇip putavamum kaṉamaṇik katavamum niṟai cīrvicaiyamum tuṟaiñir paṉṉaiyum naṉmalaiyūraiyil teṉmalaiyūrum Āḻkaṭal lakaḻcūḻ māyiruṭiṅkamum kalaṅkā valviṉai yilaṅkācokamum kāppoṟu niṟaipunal māppappāḷamum kāvalampuricai mevali
paṅkamum viḷaippattūṟuṭai vaḷaippattūṟum kalaittakkor pukaḻ talaitakkolamum tirtamāvalviṉai mātamaliṅkamum kālāmuli kaṭun=tiṟal lilāmulitecamum toṭukaṭalkāvakal kaṭumuraṭ kiṭāramum māpporu taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecaripanmaṟku yāṇṭu 10 8Āvatu maturān=takavaḷanāṭṭu Āṭaiyūrnāṭṭu Āṭaiyūr tiruvaṇṇāmalaiuṭaiyār tirumuṟṟatte śrīrājentracoḻaṉcālai Uṇṇa tiruvaṇṇāmalai śaṇḍeśvaratevarriṭai koṇṭa poṉ nāṟpatiṉ kaḻañcu koṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu . Eṅkaḷūr vaṭakkil Erikiḻ kiḻpārkkellai paḷḷiccan=tam Ūrpotuvāyk kiṭan=ta paṭṭikku meṟkum melpārkkellai paḷḷiccan=tam Iṟaṅkina Ūrpotuvāykkiṭan=ta paṭṭikku kiḻakkum teṉpārkkellai Ūrnattattoṭum Aṭain=ta vāykkālukku vaṭakku vaṭapārkkellai IraviĪśvaramuṭaiya mahaādevar nilam tāṉṟippaṭṭikku teṟkum naṭuvuḷppaṭṭa perunāṉkellai nila n=taṭi yeṭṭināṟ ṟaṇkiṭappai nila ṉāṟumāvum Iṉṉilattin melvarampāl van=ta Iraṇ ṭāṭikkiṇaṟu mikutik kuṟaimai Uḷḷaṭaṅka Iṉnilattāl van=ta Iṟaiyum nikki kaṟaiyu maṟṟum mepperppaṭṭitu nāṅkaḷe Iṟukkakkaṭavomākavum Eriyiluṅ kā
lilu nīrkkiyn=tavaṇṇam nir pāccappeṟuvatākavum Iṉṉila muḻuvār Eṅkaḷur nattattile kuṭiyirukkappeṟuvatākavum Innilattāl van=ta Iṟai koḷḷappeṟātomākavum Ippari coṭṭi viṟṟukkuṭuttom tiruvaṇṇāmalai caṇḍeśvaratevaṟku Āṭaiyūr Ūrom . Innāṭṭu Āṭaiyūrnāṭṭuc coṟiyāṉa rājentracoḻanallū rūrom śrīrājentracoḻaccālai Uṇṇa tiruvaṇṇāmalai caṇṭeśvaratevariṭai koṇṭa poṉ nāṟpatiṉ kaḻañcum koṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu . Eṅkaḷur vaṭakki lerikkiḻ koṉṟaiEttattukku kiḻpārkkellai Ivvūr rājentracoḻaIśvaramuṭaiya mahaātevar tirunan=tavāṉattukkum Ampalappaṭṭikkum mukkiyenṉum varavaikku meṟkkum teṉpārkkellai ceppettattukkut tuṇainilamāka Iṭṭa kiḻaṉmelāyk kiṭakkum varavaikkum vaṭakkil nālaṭiyil kiḻaivaravaiyil kiḻvarampukku vaṭakkum melpārkkellai vaṭakkil nālāṭiyil vaṭavarampukkum cakkiliyaṉkuṇṭilukkum perunāṉkellai nattattil nāṟukālukku kiḻakkum vaṭapārkkellai pocanettattukku teṉvarampukkut teṟkkum naṭuvupaṭṭa paṉikkayameṉṉuñ ceṟuvum Oṭaiyu muṭpaṭṭat ta nāl paṭṭi Oṉṟum Innila
ttuḷ kiṇaṟu Iraṇṭum Innilattuppaṭum Ūrnattattu toṭṭakkiṇaṟum Innilavopāti puñcai nilamum Innila muḻuvāṉ Eṅkaḷur nattatte kuṭi Iṟaikoḷḷappeṟātomākavum Innilattukku Eriyilum kālilum nirkkin=tavaṇṇam nir pāccap peṟuvatākavum Innilattāl van=ta nīrk kiṟaiyum koḷḷappeṟātomāka Iṟaiyili viṟṟukkuṭuttom tiruvaṇṇāmalai śaṇḍeśvaratevaṟkku coṟi Āṉa rājentracoḻanallūrūrom . Innāṭṭu maicāṟṟūrom tiruvaṇṇāmalai caṇḍeśvaratevariṭai koṇṭa poṉ nāṟpatiṉ kaḻañcum koṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu . Ivvūr ciṟiyaŪruṇṇiEṉṉum paṭṭikkuk kiḻpārkkellai Ūrnattattukku meṟkku teṉpārkkellai vañcikoṉaṉ puliyaṉ nilattukku vaṭakku melpārkkellai coṇan Aṇṇāvan cāttakolamum Aṇṇāvaṉ varun=taṉumuṭaiya moṭṭaceṟuvukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkkellai Atirāmaṉ kūttāṭi nilattukku teṟkku naṭuvupaṭṭa taṭi munṟum Innilattukkuppaṭum Iraṇṭaṭṭukku kiḻpārkellai Atiirāman kūttāṭiyum ceṭṭi Urumiṭiyum nilattukku meṟkum teṉpārkkellai Aṇṇāvaṉ ai vaykun=tanuñ ceṭṭi Urumiṭiyu nilattukku vaṭakkum melpārkkellai
vañcikkoṉ puliyaṉ nilattukku kiḻakku vaṭapārkkellai vañcikkon puliyan nilattukku teṟkkum naṭuvupaṭṭa taṭi Āṟum Iṉnilattukkuppaṭum muṉṟām Aṭṭukkuk kiḻpārkkellai Ūrpotuvāy kiṭakkum nilattukku meṟku tenpārkkellai Ālan=tuṟai Araicaṭikaḷ Uḷḷiṭṭār nilattu vaṭakku Atiraāman kūttāṭi Uḷḷiṭṭār nilattukkuk kiḻakku vaṭapārkkellai Ūrppotuvāy kiṭakkum nilattukku teṟkkum naṭuvupaṭṭa taṭi Aiñcum Ākat taṭi patinālināl paṭṭi Oṉṟu Innilattāl van=ta toṭṭakkiṇaṟum puñcainilamum Innilattukku Eriyilum kālilum nīrpāccappeṟuvatākavum Innilattāl van=ta nirk kiṟai koḷḷappeṟātomāka IṟaiIḻicci viṟṟukkuṭuttom tiruvaṇṇāmalai śaṇḍeśvaratevaṟku maicāṟṟuŪrrom . Innāṭṭu māttūrāna Eṟipattikaṇṭanallūrom tiruvaṇṇāmalai śaṇḍeśvaratevariṭai koṇṭa poṉ nāṟpatiṉ kaḻañcu koṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Eṅkaḷur māmalaittukku tenpārkkellai teṟkil meṭṭukkālukkum vaṭakkil vāykkālukkum vaṭakku melpārkkellai Araiyakaḷātittaṉ ṉennum ceṟuvukku kiḻakkum vaṭapārkkellai vaṭakki
ltūmpil teṟkil vāykkālukku teṟkum kiḻpārkkellai viḷāṉṉennuñ ceṟuvukkum Amaraṉkaṇṇāṟṟuk kaṭainilattukku meṟkum naṭuvupaṭṭa taṭi nālināl paṭṭi Oṉṟum Innilattukku Eṅka ḷeriyilum kālilum nirk kiyn=tavaṇṇam nir pāccappeṟuvatākavum Innilattāl van=ta Iṟaiyum nirk kiṟaiyum koḷḷappeṟātomāka Iṟaiyiḻicci viṟṟukkuṭuttom tiruvaṇṇāmalai śaṇḍeśvaratevaṟkku māttūrāna Eṟipattikaṇṭanallūrom . Iṉnāṭṭu peṇṇai vaṭakarai kuḷakkuṭiūrom tiruvaṇṇāmalai śaṇḍeśvaratevarriṭaik koṇṭa poṉ Eṇpatin kaḻañcuṅ koṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu . Eṅkaḷur melaierikiḻ kiḻpārkkellai Iluppaiyoṭukaṇṇā ṟeṉṟu per kūvappaṭum nilattukku meṟku tenpārkkellai Ivvūr Eriyilniṉṟu kiḻakkunokkip ponta peruvāykkālukku vaṭakku melpāĀṟkellai koṭupunava namutaṉ cāttanuḻum kaṇṇā ṟeṉṟu per kūvappaṭum nilattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapārkkellai paḻaiya Ūrnattattukku vaṭakkil Ūrnattattukku teṟkum Ivvicain=ta perunāṉkellaiyilum naṭuvuḷpaṭṭa nilaṉ taṭi patināṟināl mikutikkuṟai vuḷḷaṭaṅka taṉkiṭappai nilam Iraṇṭupaṭṭiyum Innilattu
kku Eṅkaḷ Eriyilum kālillum nīrk kin=tavaṇṇam nir pāccappeṟuvatākavum Innilattāl van=ta nirkku Iṟaiyum maṟṟum Epporpaṭṭatum koḷḷappeṟātomāka Iṟaiyiḻicci viṟṟukkuṭuttom tiruvaṇṇāmalai śaṇḍeśvaratevaṟku kuḷakkuṭiŪrrom .
Digital edition of SII 8.67 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
